I was certified as a [Data Carpentry Instructor](https://carpentries.org/) in 2019.

## R and bioinformatics courses

Courses I have developed and taught at [CSC - IT Center for Science Ltd](https://www.csc.fi/en/) include: 

- [Data Analysis with R](https://github.com/csc-training/da-with-r-remote) (introductory course on data wrangling, plotting and statistics)
- [Microbial Community Analysis with Chipster](https://github.com/csc-training/chipster-microbial) (intermediate course on amplicon data analysis)
- [Puhti R/RStudio Workshop](https://github.com/csc-training/puhti-r-workshop) (introductory course on using R on the [Puhti supercomputer](https://docs.csc.fi/computing/overview/))

I have also taught R courses at the [University of Helsinki](https://www.helsinki.fi/en) (KLTO-132 Statistics with R).
